column4: if anyone can help me with my wireless issue ,with broadcom, that I have been having since I got my laptop, I would really appreciate it..
I have looked at the wiki's and all, but they don't really deal with my issue, and weird how my device is named..
I don't want to be a bother, I'm thinkin of going military, really stressed out
In a world without walls and fences, who needs windows and gates..  :)
we need wireless support for dang broadcom hardware thats what we neeed .. :(
um your mom needs windows :) lol
thats what I told them, I am off of college right now, due to book fee's
Acers'.. man they nice and all, but grrr..
I"m at my buddies college with him right now. was hoping i could solve the whole wireless issue.. its really depressing me
I duel boot my desktop win2k and debian, and my dell laptop ubuntu/osxdevel
just on the lan , thats it, never actually got a working wireless, but, anto9us managed to get me somewhere, but that was on breezy, and I did a dist-upgrade and lost all settings
I used to do the whole.. boot etc.. with Acronis Disk Director Suite, heck I had like 6 Operating Systems on 1 hard drive alone
as many people could have alot
